info.description:
At least on OpenGL/nVidia, swapping line 13 with 14 or 15 doesn't give the same result.
Basically, any change in the shader makes the bug disappear.
E.g.replacing the 3 O line 13,14,15 with O.r, O.g, O.b,   or doing either #13 or #15  dep on iFrame%2
